1.verse: USimon Petros, umkhonzi nompostile kaYesu Kristu, ubhalela abo baluzuzileyo ukholo oluxabiso lunye nolwethu, ebulungiseni bukaThixo wethu, uMsindisi wethu uYesu Kristu:

2.verse: uthi, Makwandiswe kuni ubabalo noxolo, ngokumazi uThixo,  noYesu, iNkosi yethu.

3.verse: Nibona nje, ukuba amandla akhe obuThixo asiphile zonke izinto ezisingise ebomini nasekuhloneleni uThixo, ngako ukumazi lowo wasibizayo ngozuko nesidima.

4.verse: Esithe ngezo zinto, saphiwa amadinga amakhulukazi,  anqabileyo, ukuze ngawo nibe ngamadlelane ngemvelo yobuThixo,  nisinde ekonakaleni okukhoyo ehlabathini ngenkanuko.

5.verse: Ewe, ngenxa yoko, nakuba niqokele ukukhuthala konke, yithini elukholweni lwenu nongezelele isidima; esidimeni ke, ukwazi;

6.verse: ekwazini ke, ukuzeyisa; ekuzeyiseni ke, umonde; emondeni ke,  ukuhlonela uThixo;

7.verse: ekuhloneleni ke uThixo, ukuthanda abazalwana; ekuthandeni ke abazalwana, ukuthanda abantu bonke.

8.verse: Kuba xa zikhoyo ezo zinto kuni, zisanda, zinenza ukuba ninganqeni, ningabi ngabaswele isiqhamo ekuyazini iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

9.verse: Kuba lowo zingekhoyo kuye ezo zinto, uyimfama; ubona luzizi,  ekulibele ukuhlanjululwa kwezono zakhe zakudala.

10.verse: Endithi ngoko, bazalwana, makube kukhona nikhuthalele ukulwenza luqine ubizo nonyulo lwenu; kuba, nakuzenza ezo zinto, anisayi kukha nikhubeke.

11.verse: Kuba ngokunjalo nophiwa ngokobutyebi ukungena ebukumkanini obungunaphakade beNkosi yethu, uMsindisi uYesu Kristu.

12.verse: Kungoko ndingakuyekiyo ukuhlala ndinikhumbuza ngezo zinto,  noko nizaziyo, nizimasekileyo enyanisweni leyo ikhoyo kuni.

13.verse: Ndiba ke kububulungisa, ukuba ngalo gama ndikulo mnquba,  ndinivuse ngokunikhumbuza;

14.verse: ndisazi nje ukuba kukufuphi ukubekwa nxamnye kwalo mnquba wam, njengokuba nayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu yandazisayo.

15.verse: Kananjalo ndiya kukhuthalela ke ukuba nibe nako, amaxa onke emva kokumka kwam, ukuzikhunjuzwa ezo zinto.

16.verse: Kuba sithe, singalandelanga zintsomi zabuqhinga, sanazisa amandla nokufika kweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu; sithe saba ngababoneli bobungangamsha bakhe.

17.verse: Kuba wamkela kuThixo uYise imbeko nozuko, ekuzisweni kuye,  bubuqaqawuli obubalaseleyo, izwi elinjengeli: Lo nguNyana wam oyintanda, endikholisiweyo mna nguye.

18.verse: Nelo zwi ke saliva thina, lisiza liphuma ezulwini, sinaye entabeni leyo ingcwele.

19.verse: Kanjalo sinalo nelona lizwi liqinisekileyo elilelobuprofeti, enityaphayo ukulinyamekela, linjengesibane esikhanyisa endaweni emnyama, kude kuse, liphume ikhwezi ezintliziyweni zenu;

20.verse: nisazi oku kuqala, ukuba sonke isiprofeto sesibhalo asibikho ngokuzicombululela.

21.verse: Kuba akukhanga kubekho siprofeto ngokuthanda komntu; bathi abantu abangcwele bakaThixo bathetha beqhutywa nguMoya oyiNgcwele.

1.verse: Ke kaloku, kwakukho nabaprofeti ababuxoki phakathi kwabantu;  njengokuba naphakathi kwenu kuya kubakho abafundisi ababuxoki,  bona baya kungenisa bucala amahlelo entshabalalo, bemkhanyela uMnini-nto-zonke owabathengayo, bezizisela intshabalalo emsinya.

2.verse: Baninzi abaya kulandela intshabalalo yabo; eya kunyeliswa ngenxa yabo indlela yenyaniso.

3.verse: Bathi benokubawa, banibonelele ngamazwi alalanisayo;  abakugwetywa kungaphumliyo kwakudala, nayo intshabalalo yabo ayozeli.

4.verse: Kuba, xa uThixo angaziconganga izithunywa zezulu ezonayo,  wesuka wathi, ezikhahlele enzonzobileni, wazinikela emixokelelwaneni yesithokothoko, zigcinelwe umgwebo;

5.verse: naxa angaliconganga ihlabathi lakudala, wesuka walondoloza uNowa, umvakalisi wobulungisa, enabasixhenxe, akuba elihlisele unogumbe ihlabathi labangahloneli Thixo;

6.verse: xa athe nemizi yaseSodom neGomora wayitshisa yaluthuthu,  wayigweba ukuba ibhukuqeke, wayenza umzekelo wabaza kuba ngabangahloneli Thixo;

7.verse: wamhlangula uLote olilungisa, owacatshukiswa kukuhamba eburheletyweni kwabangenammiselo;

8.verse: kuba laye, ngokubona nangokuva, ilungisa elo lihleli phakathi kwabo imihla ngemihla, liwuthuthumbisa umphefumlo walo olungisayo, ngemisebenzi yabo echasene nomthetho;

9.verse: iyakwazi iNkosi ukubahlangula ekuhendweni abahlonela uThixo;  ke abangemalungisa ibagcinele imini yomgwebo, ukuba babethwe;

10.verse: ngokukodwa ke abo balandela inyama ngokukhanuka ukuzidyobha, abadela ubukhosi. Ngabasileyo, abenza ngokuzithandela, abangoyikiyo ukunyelisa izikhakhamela.

11.verse: Ukanti izithunywa zezulu, zingaphezulu nje ngokomelela namandla, azizigwebi ngamgwebo unyelisayo phambi kweNkosi.

12.verse: Ke aba, njengezinto eziphilileyo, ezingenangqondo,  ezizezemvelo, ezizalelwe ukubanjwa nokonakala, benyelisa izinto abangazaziyo, baya konakala kanye ekonakaleni kwabo, bazuzane nomvuzo wokungalungisi;

13.verse: njengababa bubuyolo ukudla ubuncwane okwemini enye;  bengamabala neziphako, bexhamla ubuncwane ngokulukuhla kwabo,  bezingxala ukudla ezidlweni nani;

14.verse: benamehlo azele lukrexezo, angenakuphunyuzwa esonweni,  bebambisa imiphefumlo engenakuzimaseka, benentliziyo eqheliswe ukubawa; abantwana bengqalekiso.

15.verse: Beyishiyile indlela ethe tye, balahleka, belandela indlela kaBhileham okaBhehore, owathanda umvuzo wokungalungisi;

16.verse: wohlwaywa ke ngokugqitha kwakhe umthetho; lathi iesile,  lingenakuthetha nje, lathetha ngezwi lomntu, lamalela umprofeti lowo, ukuba angabi nxamnye nengqondo.

17.verse: Aba bayimithombo engenamanzi, amafu aqhutywa luqhwithela,  besigcinelwe bona isithokothoko sobumnyama ngonaphakade.

18.verse: Kuba, bevakalisa nje iindumbisa zamazwi angento yanto,  babambisa ngeenkanuko zenyama, ngoburheletyo, abo babesindile,  kanye kwabo bahambayo ekulahlekisweni.

19.verse: Bebathembisa nje inkululeko, bona ngokwabo bangabakhonzi bokonakala; kuba lowo athi ubani eyiswe nguye, ukhonzisiwe nokukhonziswa kuye.

20.verse: Kuba xa bathi, besindile nje kuzo izidyobho zehlabathi ngokuyazi iNkosi, uMsindisi uYesu Kristu, babuye ke bazibhijele ngazo, boyiswe zizo, zisuke iziphelo zabo zaba mandundu kuneziqalo zabo.

21.verse: Kuba ngekubalungele kanye, ukuba bebengayazanga indlela yobulungisa, kunokuba bathi beyazile, babuye umva, baphume kuwo umthetho ongcwele abawuwiselwayo.

22.verse: Bahlelwe ke ngokomlinganiselo oyinene, othi, Inja ibuyele emhlanzweni wayo, nehagukazi eyahlanjwayo iye ekuzityikatyikeni eludakeni.

1.verse: Ngoku ndinibhalela, zintanda, le ncwadi iyeyesibini, endithi kuzo zombini ndiyivuselele ingqondo yenu engcwengekileyo ngokunikhumbuza;

2.verse: ukuba niwakhumbule amazwi abethethiwe ngenxa engaphambili ngabaprofeti abangcwele, nawo umthetho wabapostile bethu beNkosi uMsindisi;

3.verse: nikwazi nje oku kuqala, ukuba kuya kuza ngemihla yokugqibela abagxeki, behamba ngokwezabo iinkanuko,

4.verse: besithi, Liphi na kaloku idinga lokufika kwakhe? Kuba kuseloko oobawo balalayo ukufa, izinto zonke zahlala zihleli zinjengokwasekuqalekeni kwendalo.

5.verse: Kuba oku kufihlakele kubo ngokuthanda kwabo, ukuba izulu laye likho kwakudala, nomhlaba uvele emanzini, umi ngamanzi,  ngalo ilizwi likaThixo;

6.verse: elathi ngezo zinto ihlabathi langoko lantywiliselwa ngamanzi, latshabalala.

7.verse: Ke lona izulu langoku, nawo umhlaba lo, kwangelo lizwi ezo zinto ziqwetyelwe, zigcinelwe, umlilo, kuse kwimini yomgwebo nentshabalalo yabantu abangahloneli Thixo.

8.verse: Le nto ke inye mayingafihlakali kuni, zintanda, ukuba phambi kweNkosi imini enye injengeminyaka eliwaka, neminyaka eliwaka injengemini enye.

9.verse: INkosi ayilibali dinga, njengoko abathile baba iyalibala;  isuka izeke kade umsindo kuthi, ingangi kungatshabalala nabani;  inga bonke bangasinga enguqukweni.

10.verse: Iya kufika ke imini yeNkosi njengesela ebusuku, eliya kuthi ngayo izulu lidlule liqhuqhumba, zithi ke iziqalelo zitshe,  zichithakale, nomhlaba nayo imisebenzi ekuwo itshiswe kuthi tu.

11.verse: Ezo zinto zonke ngoku zichithakala nje, nimele ukuba ngabanjani na ngeehambo ezingcwele nokuhlonela uThixo;

12.verse: nikulindela, nikukhawulezela, ukufika kwayo imini kaThixo,  eliya kuthi ngenxa yayo izulu lifakwe isikhuni, lichithakale,  zithi neziqalelo zitshe zinyibilike?

13.verse: Thina ke ngokwedinga lakhe silinde elitsha izulu, nomtsha umhlaba, apho kumi ubulungisa.

14.verse: Kungoko, zintanda, nilindele ezo zinto nje, khuthalelani ukuba nifunyanwe kuye niseluxolweni, ningenabala,  ningenasiphako.

15.verse: Ukuzeka kade umsindo kweNkosi yethu kubaleleni ekuthini lusindiso, njengoko wanibhalelayo nomzalwana wethu oyintanda,  uPawulos, ngokobulumko awabunikwayo;

16.verse: njengokuba, nasezincwadini zakhe zonke, ethetha kuzo ngezo ndawo; ekukhoyo kuzo zithile ziqiqeka nzima, abathi abangafundileyo, nabangazimasekileyo, bazigqwethele kokwabo ukutshabalala, njengokuba bezenjenjalo nezinye izibhalo.

17.verse: Nina ngoko, zintanda, nizazi nje ngenxa engaphambili ezo zinto, zigcineni okwenu, ukuze ningathi, nikhukuliswe lulahlekiso lwabangenammiselo, niphalale kokukokwenu ukuqina.

18.verse: Khulani ke elubabalweni na sekuyazini iNkosi yethu,  uMsindisi uYesu Kristu. Kuye malubekho uzuko nangoku, kuse nakwimini engunaphakade. Amen.
